comment._content: "Josias [Oskar Otto] von Heeringen (9 March 1850 – 9 October 1926) was a German general of the imperial era who saw service in the First World War." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Josias_von_Heeringen de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Josias_von_Heeringen daten.digitale-sammlungen.de/0001/bsb00016409/images/inde...
